name: Cyber-Cult
description:
2D project developed by 1st year students of the Games Development course (2021/2022).

Developed by:

  • Diogo Pinto
  • Kin Hang Ma
  • Miguel Saraiva

Controls:

  • Right Arrow / D - Moves player to the right
  • Left Arrow / A - Moves player to the left
  • Up Arrow / W - Jump and Double Jump
  • Mouse cursor - Aim
  • Left mouse button - Fire weapon
  • P - Pause

For more information about the university and the Games Development B.Sc., visit this link: https://www.iade.europeia.pt/en/courses/undergraduate/global-bachelor/games-deve...
